Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Relazione, The Return of Undocumented Citizens: Weak harmonization and little attention to human rights,, Workshop: Migration in Europe: the politics of detention centres, Forum per I problem della Pace e della Guerra – Universita' di Firenze.

Lecture, La collaboration entre Europol et Interpol: vers une progressive intégration? Conference: Le volet externe de l'Espace de Liberté, de Securité et de Justice de l'Union européenne: quelles articulations pour quelles coherence?, Université de Rennes.

Relazione, The Protection of Natural Resources in EU: Water and Soil, International Conference: Climate Change in a EU-China Perspective: The Legal Framework for a Sustainable Global Market, Università di Bologna, 18 November 2011;
Lecture, The European Union and the Challenge of Migration: Focusing on People's Rights, Workshop on Migration & Security, John Jay College, City University of New York, New York, 16-17.

Relazione, Fair Trial, due process and the rights of defence in the EU legal order, International Conference Fundamental Rights in Europe and China. Between identities and universalism. Università di Bologna.

Lecture, La liberté de circulation des marchandises, des personnes, des services et des capitaux (The freedom of movement of goods, persons, services and capitals), Conference: L’Europe des libertés économiques. Fondements, Perspectives, mise en oeuvre, Université Montpellier 1.
Relazione, La procedura pregiudiziale d’urgenza nel processo civile, Giornata europea della giustizia civile, Tribunale di Bologna.
Relazione, The right to water in the EU development policy; International Conference Natural resources grabbing: erosion or legitimate exercise of State sovereignty? , University' di Cagliari.
Relazione, The Mobility between the EU and African Countries, AISA (Italian Association for African Studies) – Annual Conference, Universita' di Macerata.
Lecture, EU and Trafficking in human beings: which legal framework when victims are EU citizens?, European Union Center, University of Illinois Urbana Champaign.
Lecture, Recent developments of EU Court of Justice case-law on migration; Annual Conference on Migration Law, European Law Academy, Bruxelles.
Key Note Speech, Migration, Security, Refugees: a bit of history repeating?, Estonian Academy Security Sciences, “Challenges to Resettlement”, Tallinn.
Relazione, Migration, Equality and Access to Victims’ Rights, International Conference The principle of equality in EU Law, Universita' di Bologna.
Lecture, Trafficking in Human Beings and Human Security: A Comprehensive Approach, 7th Graz Workshop on Human Security, University of Graz.

Comitato Scientifico, International Conference "The EU as a forum of labour migration: entrepreneurship, exploitation, dignity", University' di Bologna-Campus di Forli, JM Centre of Excellence Punto Europa Forli.

Relazione, A new/old challenge for the EU migration policy: between a new management of borders and the idea of human mobility, International Conference Migrations and the Future of the Euro-Mediterranean Relationships for the Project of a New Partnership, Universita' di Bologna – Campus di Ravenna .
Lecture, Recent developments of EU Court of Justice case-law on migration; Annual Conference on Migration Law, European Law Academy, Bruxelles.

Key Note Speech, The future of the EU migration policy: management of borders and the idea of human mobility, International Conference European Union and Western Balkans relations in future perspectives, University of Tirana.
Lecture, Trafficking in Human Beings and New Ideas for a Fair Legal Framework, Alliance of Leading University on Migration (ALUM) - Workshop, University of Mannheim.
Seminario, La tratta di esseri umani e il suo contrasto: il fenomeno, le disposizioni giuridiche, la prassi applicative, Dipartimento di Scienze Politiche, Universita’ di Pisa.

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Ricerca: Il fenomeno migrazione nel sistema internazionale contemporaneo: La protezione dei rifugiati; il quadro generale; il reg. 604/2013 sullo Stato membro competente; Accoglienza e procedure per il riconoscimento della protezione; i beneficiari della protezione e l'afflusso massiccio di sfollati nell'ambito del progetto "Il contributo dell'Italia nella governance internazionale ed europea delle politiche migratorie e per la tutela dei diritti umani. Unione Università del Mediterraneo, Progetto finanziato dal MAECI
Legal Expert, Italian Delegation - Global Forum on Migration and Development, MAECI; in particolare Annual Full-Day meetings on the Rights of the Child.
Esperto sul diritto dell'Unione europea; Tavolo di Lavoro n.7 su “Stranieri ed Esecuzione Penale”; Stati Generali sull’Esecuzione Penale, Ministero della Giustizia-Italia.

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Collegio docenti, Dottorato di Ricerca Internazionale DIVERSITY MANAGEMENT AND GOVERNANCE, XXV ciclo, Universita' di Bologna, University of Graz (A), Primorska Univerza Koper (SLO), New Bulgarian University Sofia (BG)
Collegio docenti, dottorato di ricerca in DIRITTO ROMANO E DIRITTO PUBBLICO INTERNO E SOVRANAZIONALE, XXV Ciclo, Università di Palermo.
Collegio docenti, dottorato di ricerca in DIRITTO ROMANO E DIRITTO PUBBLICO INTERNO E SOVRANAZIONALE, XXVI Ciclo, Università di Palermo.
Collegio docenti, Dottorato di Ricerca in Diritto Europeo, XXXII Ciclo, Universita' di Bologna

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Teaching Staff of the LL.M Programme in European Law, University of Bologna, Module V (EU Law advanced) – Area of Freedom, Security and Justice I, China-EU School of Law at China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing;
Module, “The EU Charter of Fundamental Rights”, MA in European Studies, University of Sarajevo – University of Bologna (Joint title)
Module, “Migration, Mobility and Fundamental Rights in Europe”, European Regional MA in Democracy and Human Rights in South East Europe, University of Sarajevo – University of Bologna (Joint title).

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Visiting Professor, IEE-Université Libre de Bruxelles
Visiting Scholar, EU Center, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
Responsabile Scientifico, Summer School on “The European Union in World Politics. The EU and Migration issues”, JM Center of Excellence-Punto Europa, Universita' di Bologna, Bertinoro (FC);

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Action Jean Monnet 2010-2012: Multilateral Research Project – The external dimension of the Area of Freedom, Security and Justice - n. 2010 - 2688 /001 - 001 (University of Bologna, Rennes 1, ULB);
Data collection and research services on fundamental rights issues-procurement procedure F/SE/10/03, EU Fundamental Rights Agency.

“The European Union in World Politics: What Power? What leadership? A Multidisciplinary Approach”, JM – Centre of Excellence, Grant Decision n. 2014-1406/001-001; Legal expert on Migration; Centre of Excellence - Punto Europa, www.puntoeuropa.eu

GLOBUS, Reconsidering European Contributions to Global Justice; H2020-INT-SOCIETY-2015; Topic: INT-03-2015; Type of action: RIA; University of Bologna Staff, Legal expert on Migration. https://www.globus.uio.no

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: "The European Union Immigration Law" - Jean Monnet Programme (Module) (ref.529972-LLP-2012-IT-AJM-MO), 2012-2015.
